user.title: Add YoLink Home
user.description:
Enter your YoLink User Access Credentials (UAC) for the home you want to add. You can create UAC credentials at {uac_url}.

Each set of credentials is tied to one home, allowing you to add multiple homes separately.

reauth_confirm.title: Reauthenticate YoLink Home
reauth_confirm.description: Your credentials for {home_name} have expired. Please enter new credentials.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to YoLink API. Please check your credentials and try again.
error.timeout_connect: Timeout connecting to YoLink API. Please try again.
error.invalid_home: Could not retrieve home information. Please check your credentials.
error.wrong_home: These credentials are for a different home. Please use credentials for the same home.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

abort.already_configured: This YoLink home is already configured.
